articles.title: Effectiveness of the Ad26.COV2.S vaccine in health-care workers in South Africa (the Sisonke study): results from a single-arm, open-label, phase 3B, implementation study - The Lancet
articles.description:
The single-dose Ad26.COV2.S vaccine shows effectiveness against severe COVID-19 disease
and COVID-19-related death after vaccination, and against both beta and delta variants,
providing real-world evidence for its use globally.
